trans-unit.source: Select "Known for" topics by clicking on the "edit" link in the field below your photo and name on the Virtual Practice home page - you can choose up to 5 "Known for" topics that will direct patients and questions to your profile that are related to those topics. (see more about “Known For” topics here)

seg-source.mrk: Select "Known for" topics by clicking on the "edit" link in the field below your photo and name on the Virtual Practice home page - you can choose up to 5 "Known for" topics that will direct patients and questions to your profile that are related to those topics.

target.mrk: Selecciona temas "Conocido por" haciendo clic en el enlace "editar" en el campo debajo de tu foto y nombre en la página de inicio del Consultorio Virtual - puedes elegir hasta 5 temas "Conocido por" que dirigirán a pacientes y preguntas relacionadas a estos temas a tu perfil.
(ver más acerca de temas "Conocido por" aquí)

trans-unit.source: Add a professional looking "head and shoulders" photo to your Virtual Practice home page.

seg-source.mrk: Add a professional looking "head and shoulders" photo to your Virtual Practice home page.

target.mrk: Añade una foto de "cabeza y hombro" que se vea profesional a la página de inicio de tu Consultorio Virtual.

trans-unit.source: Start adding content to your profile by answering questions from users that interests you - this is the number 1 way to start generating traffic to your profile. Share the answers on FB and Twitter by selecting the appropriate channel after completing the answer. This can also be done from the "settings" link on the Virtual Practice home page.

seg-source.mrk: Start adding content to your profile by answering questions from users that interests you - this is the number 1 way to start generating traffic to your profile.
Share the answers on FB and Twitter by selecting the appropriate channel after completing the answer.
This can also be done from the "settings" link on the Virtual Practice home page.

target.mrk: Comienza añadiendo contenido a tu perfil al contestar preguntas de usuarios que te interesan - esta es la forma número 1 de empezar a generar tráfico a tu perfil.
Comparte las respuestas en FB y Twitter seleccionando el canal apropiado después de completar la respuesta.
Esto también se puede hacer desde el enlace "configuración" en la página de inicio del Consultorio Virtual.

trans-unit.source: Build your network of patients and colleagues. Your network size directly impacts your online reputation by attracting the attention of more specialists who will read and "Agree" with your answers - and patients who will "Thank" you. It also helps optimize your visibility to internet search engines. Recent analysis of our top doctors showed a direct correlation between network size and number of “Agrees” and "Thanks". (click here to invite colleagues or patients).

seg-source.mrk: Build your network of patients and colleagues.
Your network size directly impacts your online reputation by attracting the attention of more specialists who will read and "Agree" with your answers - and patients who will "Thank" you.
It also helps optimize your visibility to internet search engines.
Recent analysis of our top doctors showed a direct correlation between network size and number of “Agrees” and "Thanks".
(click here to invite colleagues or patients).

target.mrk: Construye tu red de pacientes y colegas.
El tamaño de tu red impacta directamente a tu reputación en línea atrayendo la atención de más especialistas que leerán y estarán "de Acuerdo" con tus respuestas - y pacientes que te "Agradecerán".
También ayuda a optimizar tu visibilidad a motores de búsqueda en internet.
Análisis reciente por parte de nuestros mejores doctores muestran una correlación entre el tamaño de la red y el número de "de Acuerdos" y "Agradecimientos".
(haz clic aquí para invitar a colegas o pacientes).

trans-unit.source: Once you have started to contribute to the site, send us an email with your CV and interesting facts about your career and we will feature you in our very popular blog.

seg-source.mrk: Once you have started to contribute to the site, send us an email with your CV and interesting facts about your career and we will feature you in our very popular blog.

target.mrk: Una vez que hayas empezado a contribuir al sitio, envíanos un correo electrónico con tu CV y hechos interesantes acerca de tu carrera y te destacaremos en nuestro muy popular blog.

trans-unit.source: Your points benefit you in many ways. The more points you collect, the higher your level and the more visible you'll be to prospective patients and referring colleagues. Every doctor starts at “certified”, but you will quickly start to advance to more prestigious levels.

seg-source.mrk: Your points benefit you in many ways.
The more points you collect, the higher your level and the more visible you'll be to prospective patients and referring colleagues.
Every doctor starts at “certified”, but you will quickly start to advance to more prestigious levels.

target.mrk: Tus puntos te benefician de muchas maneras.
Entre más puntos acumules, más alto será tu nivel y más visible serás para pacientes prospectivos y colegas referentes.
Cada doctor comienza desde "certificado", pero tú empezarás a avanzar rápidamente a niveles más prestigiosos.
Para acumular puntos:

trans-unit.source: Fewer unnecessary readmissions, with in-person care reserved for necessary treatments. More capacity for better paying use cases and second opinions.

trans-unit.source: A single secure sign-on (SSO) serves as your patients' and doctors' main interface for managing healthcare. Our safe and secure HIPAA-compliant, SOC 2 Type II-certified platform keeps data and consults confidential.

Nuestra plataforma con certificación SOC 2 Tipo II y en conformidad con HIPAA mantiene datos y consultas confidenciales.

trans-unit.source: To have someone tell you you saved his life is the best feeling in the world. Six people have told me I saved their life. trans-unit.source: Never use HealthTap Prime in an emergency situation. Always call %{emergency_number} or your local emergency service immediately if you think you may have an emergency.

seg-source.mrk: Never use HealthTap Prime in an emergency situation.
Always call %{emergency_number} or your local emergency service immediately if you think you may have an emergency.

trans-unit.source: Don’t use HealthTap Prime if you have a serious injury or condition (such as chest pain, seizures, difficulty breathing, burns, or any critical or life-threatening situation. Also, don’t use HealthTap prime for mental, behavioral, or addiction issues.

seg-source.mrk: Don’t use HealthTap Prime if you have a serious injury or condition (such as chest pain, seizures, difficulty breathing, burns, or any critical or life-threatening situation.
Also, don’t use HealthTap prime for mental, behavioral, or addiction issues.

target.mrk: No uses HealthTap Prime si tienes una lesión o condición grave (como dolor de pecho, convulsiones, dificultad para respirar, quemaduras o cualquier otra situación que amenace la vida).
También, no uses HealthTap Prime para problemas mentales, de comportamiento o de adicción.

trans-unit.source: Checklists are a great way to stay engaged with your health. These checklists contain reminders about actions you can take to reach health goals, manage health conditions, and feel good.

trans-unit.source: Please know that you may re-activate your account at any time up to one year. After one year, your account information will likely be permanently deleted. seg-source.mrk: Patients can find doctor knowledge in an extensive trusted library, schedule virtual appointments with specialists, request first and second opinions from doctors, and securely and privately share their personal health records with doctors anytime from anywhere.

target.mrk: Sin salas de espera.

Los pacientes pueden encontrar conocimiento de doctores en una extensa y confiable biblioteca, agendar citas virtuales con especialistas, solicitar primeras y segundas opiniones de doctores y compartir de forma privada y segura sus expedientes clínicos personales con doctores a cualquier hora y desde cualquier lugar.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap guides patients to the right care, at the right time, at the right cost.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap guides patients to the right care, at the right time, at the right cost.

target.mrk: HealthTap guía a pacientes a la atención adecuada, en el momento adecuado y al costo adecuado.
Disponible 24/7, a cualquier hora y en cualquier lugar.

trans-unit.source: Access individualized answers, news, and tips created by doctors based on the patient’s proprietary Health Graph and aggregate data.

seg-source.mrk: Access individualized answers, news, and tips created by doctors based on the patient’s proprietary Health Graph and aggregate data.

target.mrk: Accede a respuestas, noticias y tips individualizados creados por doctores basados en el Gráfico de Salud y datos agregados propiedad del paciente.

trans-unit.source: World-class, empathetic doctors readily available from any mobile device or PC create long-lasting relationships between the practice, its doctors, and its patients.

seg-source.mrk: World-class, empathetic doctors readily available from any mobile device or PC create long-lasting relationships between the practice, its doctors, and its patients.

target.mrk: Doctores empáticos y de clase mundial están disponibles desde cualquier dispositivo móvil o PC crean relaciones duraderas entre el consultorio, sus doctores y sus pacientes.

trans-unit.source: Reduce unnecessary doctor and ER visits through our data-driven triaging system.

seg-source.mrk: Reduce unnecessary doctor and ER visits through our data-driven triaging system.

target.mrk: Reduce visitas innecesarias al doctor o a la SU a través de nuestro sistema de triage impulsado por datos.

trans-unit.source: Lower absenteeism and presenteeism due to immediate, easy access to doctors.

seg-source.mrk: Lower absenteeism and presenteeism due to immediate, easy access to doctors.

target.mrk: Reduce al ausentismo y presentismo debido a acceso fácil e inmediato a doctores.

trans-unit.source: Offer a unique, cutting-edge healthcare solution that other companies can’t.

seg-source.mrk: Offer a unique, cutting-edge healthcare solution that other companies can’t.

target.mrk: Ofrece una solución de atención a la salud única y a la vanguardia que otras compañías no pueden.

trans-unit.source: Manage a happier, healthier workforce or member base.

seg-source.mrk: Manage a happier, healthier workforce or member base.

target.mrk: Administra una base de miembros o fuerza de trabajo más saludable y feliz.

trans-unit.source: Prevent more expensive treatments and procedures with ongoing doctor support and engagement enabling health lifestyle changes.

seg-source.mrk: Prevent more expensive treatments and procedures with ongoing doctor support and engagement enabling health lifestyle changes.

target.mrk: Prevén tratamientos y procedimientos más caros con soporte y participación de doctores que te permiten hacer cambios de estilo de vida de salud.

trans-unit.source: Enjoy peace of mind knowing that HealthTap is HIPAA-compliant and SOC 2 Type II-certified, which means your data is always safe and secure.

tu ortografía y gramática.

trans-unit.source: Questions must be in English, easy to understand, and about health or wellness topics.

seg-source.mrk: Questions must be in English, easy to understand, and about health or wellness topics.

target.mrk: Las preguntas deben de ser en inglés, fáciles de entender, y acerca de temas de salud y bienestar.

trans-unit.source: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable. Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn’t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer. You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.

seg-source.mrk: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable.
Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn’t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer.
You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.

target.mrk: Las preguntas deben incluir suficiente detalle para ser significativas y contestables.
Nombrar un tema (por ejemplo, “dolor de cabeza?”) sin preguntar algo específico, no le da al doctor suficiente información para contestar con certeza.
Puedes considerar mencionar género, duración, rango de edad, o área de cuerpo afectada.

trans-unit.source: Medications in different countries use different names, so be sure to include the generic name of the medication. Our experts are U.S.-licensed doctors and rarely answer questions about uniquely foreign medications they are not familiar with, or about hospitals or procedures in other countries that they have not visited.

seg-source.mrk: Medications in different countries use different names, so be sure to include the generic name of the medication.

Our experts are U.S.-licensed doctors and rarely answer questions about uniquely foreign medications they are not familiar with, or about hospitals or procedures in other countries that they have not visited.

target.mrk: Medicamentos en diferentes países usan nombres diferentes, así que asegúrate de incluir el nombre genérico del medicamento.

Nuestros expertos son doctores acreditados en los EE.UU. y raramente contestas preguntas acerca de medicamentos que únicamente están en el extranjero con los cuales no están familiarizados, o acerca de hospitales o procedimientos en otros países que no han visitado.

trans-unit.source: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors’ names.

seg-source.mrk: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors’ names.

target.mrk: No incluyas tu nombre, nombres de otras personas o de doctores.

trans-unit.source: We do not answer questions from minors under the age of 16, so parents should ask questions for teens and children.

seg-source.mrk: We do not answer questions from minors under the age of 16, so parents should ask questions for teens and children.

target.mrk: No contestamos preguntas de menores bajo la edad de 16 años, así que padres deben hacer preguntas por adolescentes y niños.

Realmente nos tranquilizó.

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?

seg-source.mrk: Sweat the details... at least a little.

Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks.

What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?

target.mrk: Suda los detalles... al menos un poco.

Esconder ejemplos
Bueno: Tenía un sarpullido seco con comezón en la parte de adentro de mis codos por 3 semanas.

¿Cuáles podrían ser las causas?
No tan bueno: ¿Por qué tengo un sarpullido?

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?

seg-source.mrk: Make it long enough to be helpful to others.
Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers.

Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?

target.mrk: Hazla suficientemente larga para ser útil para otros.
Millones de personas de todo el mundo pueden leer tu pregunta y sus respuestas.

Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Qué podría causar dolor de espalda baja después de hacer el qué hacer de la casa? – ¿Nunca he tenido una lesión en la espalda?
No tan bueno: Why back pain?

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?

seg-source.mrk:
Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?

target.mrk: Incluye sexo/género cuando sea relevante.

Mostrar ejemplos
Sexo/Género útil: Qué podria causar una bola, del tamaño de una moneda, justo debajo del seno de hombre.
Sexo/Género no necesario: ¿Qué podría causar una bolita, del tamaño de un frijo, debajo de la piel del dorso de mi mano?

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?

seg-source.mrk:
Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts.
What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?

target.mrk: Incluye edad aproximada.

Mostrar ejemplos
Diferentes edades llevarán a diferentes respuestas: Por los últimos 2 días, mi hijo de 15 años ha tenido una fiebre y ha estado cojeando como si le doliera su pierna.
¿Qué son algunas de las cosas que podrían causar esto?
¿Por qué mi bebé de 3 años ha estado experimentando fiebre y cojea como si le doliera su pierna desde los últimos 2 días?

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?

seg-source.mrk: Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.

Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall.

Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34.
Is he OK for his age?

target.mrk: Incluye peso, edad y unidades de dosis donde sea relevante

Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Mi hijo tiene 3 años, pesa 27 libras y tiene 34 pulgadas de estatura.

¿Está bien su tamaño para su edad?
No tan bien: Mi hijo tiene 3, pesa 27 y mide 34.
¿Está bien para su edad?

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?

seg-source.mrk: Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.

Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever.
He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists.

Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever.

target.mrk: Por favor, usa la el nombre de marca y genérico para medicamentos, especialmente si estás fuera de los EE.UU. o preguntando sobre un medicamento poco común.

Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Mi hijo tiene 5 años, 55lbs, y tiene una fiebre.
Tomó 5ml de Tylenol (acetaminofen120mg/5ml), pero su fiebre persiste.

¿Pueden los niños de este peso y edad tomar una dosis más grande de Tylenol?
Not tan bueno: Mi hijo tiene 5, pesa 55 y tiene una fiebre.
Intenté con Tylenol pero fiebre persiste.
¿Tomar más Tylenol?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?

seg-source.mrk: Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer.

Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?

target.mrk: Trata de evitar preguntas que hagan que los doctores tengan que contestar SÍ o NO.

Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Cómo funcionan los antibióticos en niños jovenes de edad escolar?
Not tan bueno: ¿Funcionan los antibióticos en niños?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?

seg-source.mrk:
Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?

target.mrk: Intenta dejar fuera las opiniones.

Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Por qué algunas personas están en contra de las vacunas, cuando las vacunas se usan para prevenir males enfermedades?
No tan bueno: ¿La gente anti vacuna está perdida o en solo en negación?

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?

seg-source.mrk: Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang.

Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps.

Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?

target.mrk: Entre más claro, mejor.
Usa buena gramática, evita blasfemias y aléjate de la jerga.

Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Estaba haciendo curIs de bíceps y sentí un dolor quemante en mis bíceps.

¿Podría tener un desgarro muscular?
No tan bueno: Haciendo curls, sentí algo y me duele el brazo?

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.

Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear.

Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?

target.mrk: No asumas conocimiento de antecedentes personales.
Los doctores de HealthTap a menudo no habrán visto tus preguntas previas.

Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: A mi hijo de 2 años le pusieron tubos en los oídos hace 2 meses y ahora tiene fiebre y le está saliendo puso del oído derecho.

¿Es común esto?
No tan bueno: Y ya tiene 2 días, y también le está saliendo pus?

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:

Not so good: Hello doctor.
My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.

target.mrk: Para conservar privacidad, deja fuera tu nombre y los nombres de otros (a menos de que ese “otro” sea una celebridad que haya hablado públicamente acerca de un problema).

Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Acabo de escuchar al actor Michael J. Fox hablar acerca de su enfermedad de Parkinson.

¿Hay nuevos buenos tratamientos que hayan salido en los últimos 3 años?
No tan bueno: Hola doctor.
Mi nombre es John Doe, y me pregunto si hay buenos tratamientos para la enfermedad de Parkinson.

Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples

Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?

Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples

seg-source.mrk: Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing.

Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?

target.mrk: Evita usar demasiadas abreviaciones porque se pueden poner muy confusas.

No tan bueno: ¿Cómo sabs si stas panzona si nunc tienes priods regus?

trans-unit.source: After you Thank an Expert, you'll have an opportunity to add a Thank You Note. Thank You Notes show added appreciation, and experts can post these notes to their Virtual Practices. (Please do not include any questions or information in these notes, and only send what you agree can be publicly shared).

seg-source.mrk: After you Thank an Expert, you'll have an opportunity to add a Thank You Note.
Thank You Notes show added appreciation, and experts can post these notes to their Virtual Practices.
(Please do not include any questions or information in these notes, and only send what you agree can be publicly shared).

target.mrk: Después de Agradecer a un Experto, tendrás la oportunidad de añadir una Nota de Agradecimiento.
Las Notas de Agradecimiento muestran apreciación extra, y los expertos pueden publicar estas notas en sus Consultorios Virtuales.
(Por favor, no incluyas ninguna pregunta o información en estas notas, y solo envía con lo que estés de acuerdo que sea compartido públicamente).

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s now gives you instant access to the latest peer-reviewed medical research, together with insights about it and comments on it from the medical experts on HealthTap. Have a question about a published study? We’ve got you covered – you can send a public question to our network, or even ask the doctor of your choice a question about the research via a Private Conversation on HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap’s now gives you instant access to the latest peer-reviewed medical research, together with insights about it and comments on it from the medical experts on HealthTap.
Have a question about a published study?
We’ve got you covered – you can send a public question to our network, or even ask the doctor of your choice a question about the research via a Private Conversation on HealthTap.

target.mrk: HealthTap ahora te da acceso instantáneo a lo último en investigación médica con revisión por pares, junto con las observaciones y comentarios de los expertos médicos en HealthTap.
¿Tienes una pregunta acerca de un estudio publicado?

Te tenemos cubierto - puedes enviar una pregunta pública a nuestra red, o hasta hacerle una pregunta al doctor de tu elección acerca de la investigación a través de una Conversación Privada en HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: Want clarification? Ask a question about the article to our community of experts, or even enter into a Private Conversation about it with the doctor you choose.

seg-source.mrk: Ask a question about the article to our community of experts, or even enter into a Private Conversation about it with the doctor you choose.

target.mrk: ¿Quieres aclaraciones?
Haz una pregunta acerca de un artículo a nuestra comunidad de expertos, o hasta entra en una Conversación Privada con el doctor de tu elección.

trans-unit.source: Want to know what other doctors think of the research? Read the comments posted by medical experts, and learn what they have to say.

seg-source.mrk: Want to know what other doctors think of the research?
Read the comments posted by medical experts, and learn what they have to say.

target.mrk: ¿Quieres saber que piensan otros doctores acerca de la investigación?
Lee los comentarios publicados por expertos médicos, y conoce lo que tienen que decir.

trans-unit.source: Want to learn more? Quickly find other related publications on HealthTap, including similar research or articles by the same authors.

seg-source.mrk: Quickly find other related publications on HealthTap, including similar research or articles by the same authors.

target.mrk: ¿Quieres aprender más?
Encuentra rápidamente otras publicaciones relacionadas en HealthTap, incluyendo investigación similar o artículos por los mismos autores.

trans-unit.source: Highlight your published studies, add a user-friendly description of the findings, and even answer user questions about it (including Private Conversation requests). You can also add comments to any other published study on HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: Highlight your published studies, add a user-friendly description of the findings, and even answer user questions about it (including Private Conversation requests).
You can also add comments to any other published study on HealthTap.

target.mrk: Resalta tus estudios publicados, añade descripciones accesibles al usuario acerca de las conclusiones, y hasta contesta preguntas de usuarios al respecto (incluyendo peticiones de Conversación Privada).
También puedes añadir comentarios a cualquier otro estudio publicado en HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s new Publications feature expands the reach of your expertise. Studies in peer-reviewed publications are now highlighted on HealthTap, directly from your Virtual Practice. Your research will be highlighted to Members looking for related health information on HealthTap, and you can even add to the description of your work. Have comments on an existing study? We’ve got you covered – add comments to the publications and even answer public questions or engage in private conversations with members about any study listed on HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap’s new Publications feature expands the reach of your expertise.
Studies in peer-reviewed publications are now highlighted on HealthTap, directly from your Virtual Practice.
Your research will be highlighted to Members looking for related health information on HealthTap, and you can even add to the description of your work.
Have comments on an existing study?
We’ve got you covered – add comments to the publications and even answer public questions or engage in private conversations with members about any study listed on HealthTap.

target.mrk: La nueva función de Publicaciones de HealthTap expande el alcance de tu destreza.
Estudios en publicaciones con revisión por pares ahora están resaltados en HealthTap, directamente desde tu Consultorio Virtual.
Tu investigación será resaltada para miembros buscando información de salud relacionada en HealthTap, y hasta puedes añadir una descripción de tu trabajo.
¿Tienes comentarios sobre un estudio existente?
Te tenemos cubierto - añade comentarios a publicaciones y hasta contesta preguntas públicas, o participa en conversaciones privadas con miembros acerca de cualquier estudio listado en HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to answer this private message, just click the Answer button. If you don't wish to or aren't able to respond within 72 hours, you can instead click the "Sorry, I cannot help you" button below. Responding in a timely fashion will improve your Responsiveness and your DocScore.

seg-source.mrk: If you wish to answer this private message, just click the Answer button.
If you don't wish to or aren't able to respond within 72 hours, you can instead click the "Sorry, I cannot help you" button below.
Responding in a timely fashion will improve your Responsiveness and your DocScore.

target.mrk: Si deseas responder a este mensaje privado, solo haz clic en el botón Respuesta.
Si no deseas hacerlo o no puedes responder dentro de 72 horas, puedes hacer clic en el botón “Perdón, no puedo ayudarte” abajo.
Responder en un tiempo razonable mejora tu Capacidad de Respuesta y tu DocScore.

trans-unit.source: At HealthTap, we value trust and quality. That’s why we identify select top doctors in every specialty, and highlight them to patients and peers. We also provide these doctors with special privileges on HealthTap, including membership in ClubMD and status as a HealthTap Scholar.

seg-source.mrk: At HealthTap, we value trust and quality.
That’s why we identify select top doctors in every specialty, and highlight them to patients and peers.
We also provide these doctors with special privileges on HealthTap, including membership in ClubMD and status as a HealthTap Scholar.

target.mrk: En HealthTap, valoramos la calidad y la confianza.
Es por eso que identificamos a los selectos y mejores doctores en cada especialidad, y los resaltamos a pacientes y pares.
También les brindamos privilegios especiales a estos doctores en HealthTap, incluyendo membresía a ClubMD y posición como un Scholar de HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Scholars are a highly select group of leading doctors, and include the most engaged, respected, and helpful experts on HealthTap. The training, career accomplishments, and overall enthusiasm for HealthTap and its mission set these leaders apart. Members of this invitation-only group, identified by the Scholar badge on their profile, play a key role in curating the world’s best health information online.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap Scholars are a highly select group of leading doctors, and include the most engaged, respected, and helpful experts on HealthTap.
The training, career accomplishments, and overall enthusiasm for HealthTap and its mission set these leaders apart.
Members of this invitation-only group, identified by the Scholar badge on their profile, play a key role in curating the world’s best health information online.

target.mrk: Los Scholars de HealthTap son un grupo de selecto de doctores líderes, e incluyen a los expertos más comprometidos, respetados y útiles en HealthTap.
El entrenamiento, logros de carrera, y entusiasmo en general por HealthTap y su misión es lo que separa a estos líderes.
Miembros de este grupo solo por invitación, identificados por la medalla de Scholar en su perfil, juegan un rol clave en la selección de la mejor información de salud en línea.

trans-unit.source: "We love the power that HealthTap unleashes to doctors and patients – and we wanted the reproduce that functionality for our community. So rather than re-inventing the wheel, we plugged our users directly into their service, and are unlocking the power of doctor-patient interaction right within our own web portal. Integration took us a fraction of the time it would have taken us to develop an inferior solution from scratch."

seg-source.mrk: "We love the power that HealthTap unleashes to doctors and patients – and we wanted the reproduce that functionality for our community.
So rather than re-inventing the wheel, we plugged our users directly into their service, and are unlocking the power of doctor-patient interaction right within our own web portal.
Integration took us a fraction of the time it would have taken us to develop an inferior solution from scratch."

target.mrk: “Amamos el poder que HealthTap desata a doctores y pacientes - y queríamos reproducir esa funcionalidad para nuestra comunidad.
Así que, en vez de reinventar la rueda, conectamos a nuestros usuarios directamente a su servicio, y estamos desbloqueando el poder de la interacción médico-paciente justo en nuestro portal web.
La integración nos tomó una fracción del tiempo que nos hubiera tomado desarrollar una solución inferior de la nada.”

trans-unit.source: At Waikato District Health Board ("Waikato DHB"), your privacy is important to us. This document gives you details about SmartHealth and how your information will be used and kept secure.

seg-source.mrk: At Waikato District Health Board ("Waikato DHB"), your privacy is important to us.
This document gives you details about SmartHealth and how your information will be used and kept secure.

target.mrk: En la Waikato District Health Board (”Waikato DHB”), tu privacidad es importante para nosotros.
Este documento te da detalles acerca de SmartHealth y cómo tu información será usada y mantenida segura.

trans-unit.source: A "Consult" within SmartHealth system will allow you to have either a video (using a computer, a video camera and a microphone) consultation or a typed / text consultation with a Waikato DHB clinician. During the consultation, the Waikato DHB clinician will update information about the consultation (e.g. information they provided you during the consultation such as diagnosis or treatment). This information will be stored in SmartHealth system and also sent to update your clinical record maintained at Waikato DHB and the Primary Health Organisation (e.g. your GP) that you are registered with, just as if they saw you in person.

seg-source.mrk: A "Consult" within SmartHealth system will allow you to have either a video (using a computer, a video camera and a microphone) consultation or a typed / text consultation with a Waikato DHB clinician.
During the consultation, the Waikato DHB clinician will update information about the consultation (e.g. information they provided you during the consultation such as diagnosis or treatment).

This information will be stored in SmartHealth system and also sent to update your clinical record maintained at Waikato DHB and the Primary Health Organisation (e.g. your GP) that you are registered with, just as if they saw you in person.

target.mrk: Una “Consulta” dentro del sistema de SmartHealth te permitirá tener ya sea un video (usando una computadora, una videocámara y un micrófono) consulta o una consulta escrita con un clínico de la Waikato DHB.
Durante la consulta, el clínico de la Waikato DHB actualizará información sobre la consulta (e.g. información que te otorgaron durante la consulta como un diagnóstico o tratamiento).

La información será almacenada en el sistema de SmartHealth y también será enviada para actualizar tu expediente clínico mantenido en la Waikato DHB and y a la Organización de Salud Primaria (e.g. tu MG) con la que estas registrado, justo como si te hubieran visto en persona.

trans-unit.source: On a private, safe and highly secured computer storage system in the United States of America (called a "Cloud"). This system meets the information security standards of the United States of America and New Zealand.

seg-source.mrk: On a private, safe and highly secured computer storage system in the United States of America (called a "Cloud").
This system meets the information security standards of the United States of America and New Zealand.

target.mrk: En un sistema de privado y seguro de almacenamiento computarizado en los Estados Unidos de América (llamado una “Nube”).
Este sistema cumple los estándares de seguridad de los Estados Unidos de América y Nueva Zelanda.

trans-unit.source: doctors can prescribe medication and refill prescriptions, which you can conveniently pick up at your local pharmacy. By collaborating with Quest Diagnostics, our doctors can also order and review lab tests through virtual consults. Simply visit one of the thousands of local test centers nationwide to save multiple trips to the doctor.

target.mrk: los doctores pueden recetarte medicamentos y resurtir recetas, las cuales puedes recoger convenientemente en tu farmacia local.
Colaborando con Quest Diagnostics, nuestros doctores también pueden ordenar y revisar pruebas de laboratorio a través de consultas virtuales.
Simplemente visita uno de los miles de centros de pruebas locales en la nación para ahorrarte múltiples viajes al doctor.

trans-unit.source: Standard virtual consults: In these consults, doctors who have accepted you as a patient (whether for “on call” care, unless you already have an ongoing care relationship with the doctor) can provide care. You may receive an examination (within the limits of virtual care), provide a medical history, obtain an assessment from a physician, and receive a treatment plan as determined to be medically appropriate by the consulting doctor.

seg-source.mrk: In these consults, doctors who have accepted you as a patient (whether for “on call” care, unless you already have an ongoing care relationship with the doctor) can provide care.

You may receive an examination (within the limits of virtual care), provide a medical history, obtain an assessment from a physician, and receive a treatment plan as determined to be medically appropriate by the consulting doctor.

target.mrk: Consultas virtuales estándar:
En estas consultas, los doctores que te han aceptado como paciente (sea para atención “de guardia”, a menos de que ya tengas una relación en curso de atención con el doctor) pueden brindar atención.

Tú puedes recibir un examen (dentro de los límites de la atención virtual), proporcionar una historia clínica, obtener una valoración de un médico, y recibir un plan de tratamiento determinado como médicamente apropiado por el doctor consultante.

trans-unit.source: Introductory Consult: this is the first interaction with a new doctor or a doctor who has not yet accepted you as a patient on HealthTap. An introductory consult is not intended for the doctor to give you care. Introductory consults are for providing you with information or get to know the doctor and to determine if she or he can help you with your health concern (in person and/or through virtual consults). A doctor may need to invite you to her or his office for an in person appointment in order to accept you as a patient on HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: Introductory Consult: this is the first interaction with a new doctor or a doctor who has not yet accepted you as a patient on HealthTap.
An introductory consult is not intended for the doctor to give you care.
Introductory consults are for providing you with information or get to know the doctor and to determine if she or he can help you with your health concern (in person and/or through virtual consults).
A doctor may need to invite you to her or his office for an in person appointment in order to accept you as a patient on HealthTap.

target.mrk: Consulta Introductoria: esta es la primera interacción con un nuevo doctor o con un doctor que aún no te ha aceptado como paciente en HealthTap.
Una consulta introductoria no está dirigida para que el doctor te brinde atención.

Las consultas introductorias son para brindarte información o para llegar a conocer al doctor y determinar si él o ella puede ayudarte con tus preocupaciones de salud (en persona y/o a través de consultas virtuales).
Un doctor puede necesitar invitarte a su oficina para una cita en persona a fin de aceptarte como paciente en HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is intended to give you easy access to health information (and even care) on your computer or mobile device. As a HealthTap patient (with a HealthTap Prime membership or other access to consulting doctors on HealthTap), you are entitled to receive medically necessary and appropriate care, and you agree not to abuse or overuse the access to doctors provided to you. Overuse includes requests for multiple opinions on single medical condition HealthTap consults should not be used : to obtain numerous opinions on a single medical condition. In general, doctors may discourage this practice and may be hesitant to provide an assessment to those patients who attempt to seek multiple consults. In cases where there is an absolute medical necessity, it may be appropriate to do more than one consult in a day about a specific health issue, but you may also need to consider seeking in-person care or emergency services if the level of severity truly is at the point where multiple consults are warranted (especially if in-person care is recommended by a consulting doctor on HealthTap).

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap is intended to give you easy access to health information (and even care) on your computer or mobile device.

As a HealthTap patient (with a HealthTap Prime membership or other access to consulting doctors on HealthTap), you are entitled to receive medically necessary and appropriate care, and you agree not to abuse or overuse the access to doctors provided to you.
Overuse includes requests for multiple opinions on single medical condition HealthTap consults should not be used : to obtain numerous opinions on a single medical condition.
In general, doctors may discourage this practice and may be hesitant to provide an assessment to those patients who attempt to seek multiple consults.

In cases where there is an absolute medical necessity, it may be appropriate to do more than one consult in a day about a specific health issue, but you may also need to consider seeking in-person care or emergency services if the level of severity truly is at the point where multiple consults are warranted (especially if in-person care is recommended by a consulting doctor on HealthTap).

target.mrk: HealthTap está dirigido para darte fácil acceso a información de salud (y hasta atención) en tu computadora o dispositivo móvil.

Como un paciente de HealthTap (con una membresía a HealthTap Prime u otro acceso a doctores consultantes en HealthTap), tienes derecho a recibir atención médica necesaria y apropiada, y aceptas no abusar o usar excesivamente el acceso a los doctores que se te brinda.

Uso excesivo incluye solicitudes para múltiples opiniones acerca de una sola condición médica. Las consultas de HealthTap no deben de ser usadas: para obtener numerosas opiniones acerca de una sola condición médica.
En general, los doctores pueden desalentar esta práctica y pueden vacilar en brindar una valoración a aquellos pacientes que intenten buscar múltiples consultas.

En casos donde haya una necesidad médica absoluta, puede ser apropiado el hacer más de una consulta al día sobre un problema de salud específico, pero también puedes necesitar considerar buscar atención en persona o servicios de emergencia si el nivel de severidad está verdaderamente al punto en donde múltiples consultas sean justificadas (especialmente si la atención en persona es recomendada por un doctor consultante en HealthTap).

trans-unit.source: If you signed up for a free trial or limited-period discount HealthTap Prime account, and allow the trial or discount period to expire, your account will automatically convert to a standard paid subscription account (starting your full-price subscription period and recurring charges). For the first month of your full-price paid subscription only, you have a 72-hour grace period to notify HealthTap Support in writing if you do not want to continue the subscription and/or to request a refund of your first month’s full-price subscription fee. This grace-period does not apply if you have engaged in one or more consults after the free-trial period. You may cancel your subscription at any time, and your subscription will be valid through the then current pre-paid month. HealthTap does not offer partial-month refunds.

seg-source.mrk: If you signed up for a free trial or limited-period discount HealthTap Prime account, and allow the trial or discount period to expire, your account will automatically convert to a standard paid subscription account (starting your full-price subscription period and recurring charges).

For the first month of your full-price paid subscription only, you have a 72-hour grace period to notify HealthTap Support in writing if you do not want to continue the subscription and/or to request a refund of your first month’s full-price subscription fee.
This grace-period does not apply if you have engaged in one or more consults after the free-trial period.
You may cancel your subscription at any time, and your subscription will be valid through the then current pre-paid month.
HealthTap does not offer partial-month refunds.

target.mrk: Si te registraste para una prueba gratis o a una cuenta de HealthTap Prime con descuento por periodo limitado, tu cuenta automáticamente se convertirá en una cuenta con suscripción pagada estándar (empezando tu periodo de suscripción a precio completo y cargos recurrentes).

Por el primer mes de tu suscripción pagada a precio completo solamente, tienes un periodo de gracia de 72 horas para notificar a HealthTap por escrito que no quieres continuar con la suscripción y/o solicitar un reembolso de la cuota de tu primer mes de suscripción de tiempo completo.
Este periodo de gracia no aplica si has participado en una o más consultas después del periodo de prueba gratis.
Puedes cancelar tu suscripción en cualquier momento, y tu suscripción será válida por todo el mes ya pagado.
HealthTap no ofrece reembolsos de meses parciales.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime offers primary-care consults from specific physicians on HealthTap only. Consults for specialist care are not available on HealthTap Prime. HealthTap Prime consults are available under an “on call” model where you will be connected with the first-available HealthTap Prime physician. If you wish to or do select a specific doctor (including specialists) to consult, these consults are part of the HealthTap Concierge service, are not included in your HealthTap Prime subscription, and are subject to additional per-consult fees. HealthTap Prime may not cover the cost of consults that originated from searching for a specific doctor or specialty. Pricing for any Concierge consults will be shown prior to initiating such consults and by participating in such a consult you agree to pay the fees associated with such a consult.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap Prime offers primary-care consults from specific physicians on HealthTap only.
Consults for specialist care are not available on HealthTap Prime.
HealthTap Prime consults are available under an “on call” model where you will be connected with the first-available HealthTap Prime physician.

If you wish to or do select a specific doctor (including specialists) to consult, these consults are part of the HealthTap Concierge service, are not included in your HealthTap Prime subscription, and are subject to additional per-consult fees.
HealthTap Prime may not cover the cost of consults that originated from searching for a specific doctor or specialty.
Pricing for any Concierge consults will be shown prior to initiating such consults and by participating in such a consult you agree to pay the fees associated with such a consult.

target.mrk: HealthTap Prime ofrece consultas de atención primaria de médicos específicos solamente en HealthTap.
Consultas para atención de especialista no están disponibles en HealthTap Prime.
Las Consultas de HealthTap Prime están disponibles debajo de un modelo “de guardia” donde serás conectado con el primer médico de HealthTap Prime disponible.

Si deseas a o seleccionas a un doctor específico (incluyendo especialistas) para consultar, estas consultas son parte del servicio de HealthTap Concierge, no son incluidas en tu suscripción de HealthTap Prime, y son sujetas a cuotas por consulta adicionales.
HealthTap Prime puede no cubrir el costo de consultas que se originaron de buscar por un médico o especialidad específica.
El precio de cualquier consulta Concierge será mostrado previo a iniciar dicha consulta y al participar en dicha consulta tú aceptas pagar las cuotas asociadas con dicha consulta.

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for monitoring your financial accounts and statements, and HealthTap is not responsible for any charges actually or allegedly not authorized by any account holder. In the event that HealthTap agrees to provide you with a refund for any reason (including but not limited to claims of unauthorized charges), the maximum refund to which you will be entitled is sixty (60) days from the time of purchase. Unsubscribing from messages from HealthTap and/or uninstalling the HealthTap app do not automatically cancel any subscriptions you have on HealthTap, nor do these actions cancel your obligations to pay for any such subscriptions still active on HealthTap.

Unsubscribing from messages from HealthTap and/or uninstalling the HealthTap app do not automatically cancel any subscriptions you have on HealthTap, nor do these actions cancel your obligations to pay for any such subscriptions still active on HealthTap.

target.mrk: Tú eres responsable de monitorear tus cuentas y estados de cuenta financieros, y HealthTap no es responsable por cualesquiera cargos reales o presuntamente no autorizados por el titular de la cuenta.

En el evento de que HealthTap esté de acuerdo con brindarte un reembolso por cualquier razón (incluyendo, pero no limitado a reclamaciones de cargos no autorizados), el reembolso máximo al cual tendrás derecho es a sesenta (60) días del tiempo de compra.

Cancelar la suscripción de mensajes de HealthTap y/o desinstalando la Aplicación de HealthTap no cancela automáticamente ninguna suscripción que tengas en HealthTap, ni estas acciones cancelan tus obligaciones a pagar por dichas suscripciones todavía activas en HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to apply your health insurance coverage to virtual consults with eligible doctors (where available), simply select Insurance under Payment Information to confirm coverage and your copay. A claim will be submitted following the consult. By requesting to submit this claim under insurance you agree to pay any associated insurance fees (such as copayment and deductible fees) under your insurance plan and to be personally responsible for any costs associated with the care received that are not covered or are denied by your insurance carrier.

target.mrk: Si deseas aplicar tu cobertura de seguro médico a Consultas Virtuales con doctores elegibles (donde sea disponible), simplemente selecciona Seguro bajo Información de Pago para confirmar cobertura y tu copago.
Una reclamación será presentada seguida de la consulta.

Al solicitar el enviar esta reclamación bajo seguro, tú aceptas pagar cualquier cuota asociada al seguro (como copago o cuotas deducibles) bajo tu plan de seguro y de ser personalmente responsable por cualquier costo asociado con la atención recibida que no esté cubierta o sea negada por tu compañía de seguro.

trans-unit.source: If you agree to accept health insurance coverage for Concierge virtual consults with eligible patients (where available), you agree that HealthTap may submit the initial claim form on your behalf based on the completed consult SOAP note. By agreeing to accept this claim under insurance coverage (where available), you agree to assume all responsibility and liability for rejected claims, for collection of amounts due for such consults, and to hold HealthTap harmless from any and all claims, losses or harm related to any such consults or submissions. Where insurance claims are denied, for any reason, you understand and agree that you are solely responsible for any re-submission or appeal of claim denials, and that HealthTap is not involved in the claims re-submission process.

seg-source.mrk: If you agree to accept health insurance coverage for Concierge virtual consults with eligible patients (where available), you agree that HealthTap may submit the initial claim form on your behalf based on the completed consult SOAP note.

By agreeing to accept this claim under insurance coverage (where available), you agree to assume all responsibility and liability for rejected claims, for collection of amounts due for such consults, and to hold HealthTap harmless from any and all claims, losses or harm related to any such consults or submissions.

Where insurance claims are denied, for any reason, you understand and agree that you are solely responsible for any re-submission or appeal of claim denials, and that HealthTap is not involved in the claims re-submission process.

target.mrk: Si estás de acuerdo en aceptar cobertura de seguro médico para Consultas Virtuales de Concierge con pacientes elegibles (donde sea aplicable), tú aceptas que HealthTap puede presentar la reclamación inicial en tu nombre basada en la nota SOAP completa de la consulta.

Al estar de acuerdo en aceptar esta reclamación bajo cobertura de seguro (donde sea disponible), tú aceptas asumir toda la responsabilidad y obligación por reclamaciones rechazadas, por la recolección de cantidades debidas por dichas consultas, y de eximir a HealthTap de cualesquiera y todas las reclamaciones, pérdidas o perjuicio relacionado con dichas consultas o presentaciones.

Donde las reclamaciones de seguros son negadas, por cualquier razón, tú comprendes y aceptas que tú eres exclusivamente responsable por cualquier reenvío o apelación de rechazos de reclamaciones, y que HealthTap no está involucrado en el proceso de reenvío de reclamaciones.

trans-unit.source: With more than 65,742 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, we have 1,623,598 years of clinical experience on tap. We have asked our doctors to use this experience to rate the effectiveness and clinical usefulness of thousands of medications for medical conditions and other indications.

We have asked our doctors to use this experience to rate the effectiveness and clinical usefulness of thousands of medications for medical conditions and other indications.

target.mrk: Con más de 65,742 doctores en la Red de Expertos Médicos de HealthTap, tenemos 1,623,598 años de experiencia clínica disponible.

trans-unit.source: RateRx is a living work. As an open and ongoing feature on the HealthTap platform, any U.S.-licensed doctor in good standing can contribute to this data at any time. RateRx data reflect the ongoing feedback and ratings provided by doctors based on their real-world use of medications in treating patients, serving as a unique, continuously updated resource for the efficacy of both existing and new treatments.

Los datos de RateRx reflejan los continuos comentarios y calificaciones proporcionadas por doctores basados en su uso de medicamentos en el tratamiento de pacientes en el mundo real, sirviendo como una fuente única y continuamente actualizada para la eficacia de tratamientos existentes y nuevos.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap does not share your Personally Identifiable Information (for example, your real name or email address) with anyone unless you permit it. When you enter into a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap for a fee, you permit your Personally Identifiable Information to be made available to this doctor. HealthTap works by helping you find reliable and personalized health information. As part of this service, HealthTap may provide you with information about external service providers (“Service Providers”) that may be of interest or use to you (for example, a health clinic). HealthTap does not provide these external Service Providers with any Personally Identifiable Information about you, without your express consent. Service Providers cannot access your Health Activity or other health and wellness information through HealthTap.

Los Proveedores de Servicio no pueden acceder a tu Actividad de Salud u otra información de salud o bienestar a través de HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: You will be treating patients with non-emergency clinical care issues. The most common issues include coughs, colds, respiratory problems, abdominal pain, allergies, muscular pains, minor infections, fever, influenza, nausea, rashes, sports injuries, and strep throat. The patients you will be seeing will be physically located in the states in which you hold active medical licenses. Or they may be patients contacting HealthTap from overseas locations.

target.mrk: Estarás tratando pacientes con problemas de atención clínica no urgentes.

Los pacientes que verás estarán ubicados físicamente en los estados en los cuales tienes una licencia médica activa.
O pueden ser pacientes contactando a HealthTap desde ubicaciones en el extranjero.

trans-unit.source: Term. target.mrk: Plazo.

trans-unit.source: By dividing apps into 30 separate categories, AppRx and the HealthTap Annual AppRx Report help users make sense of the vast landscape of health and wellness apps. The independent reviews provided by doctors on HealthTap help both patients and peer doctors learn which apps are medically sound, useful in supporting health or wellness goals, and easy to learn and use. The ratings reveal some surprising recommendations for best apps that might otherwise be missed.

seg-source.mrk: By dividing apps into 30 separate categories, AppRx and the HealthTap Annual AppRx Report help users make sense of the vast landscape of health and wellness apps.

The independent reviews provided by doctors on HealthTap help both patients and peer doctors learn which apps are medically sound, useful in supporting health or wellness goals, and easy to learn and use.
The ratings reveal some surprising recommendations for best apps that might otherwise be missed.

target.mrk: Al dividir las aplicaciones en 30 categorías separadas, AppRx y el Reporte Anual de AppRx de HealthTap ayudan a usuarios a comprender el vasto paisaje de aplicaciones de salud y bienestar.

Las valoraciones independientes brindadas por doctores en HealthTap ayudan tanto a pacientes como a doctores pares a aprender cuáles aplicaciones son médicamente correctas, útiles en apoyar a la salud o metas de bienestar, y fáciles de aprender y usar.
Las calificaciones revelan algunas sorprendentes recomendaciones para las mejores aplicaciones que podrían haberse perdido de otra manera.

trans-unit.source: c. Commissions are held for a period of 2 months from any purchase to protect Company in the event of any chargeback that may occur. Company shall pay all Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate within fifteen (15) days of the first day of each month after such holdback period (the “Commission Payment Date”). Company may withhold any Commission payments as well as any actual chargeback fees for which the Company is liable that are generated through transactions from sign ups through the Affiliate Link (“Affiliate Chargeback Fees”), from any Commission Payments to Affiliate. If at any time Affiliate’s Commission Payments balance is negative as a result of Affiliate Chargeback Fees, Company may suspend or terminate the Affiliate Link or Affiliate’s participation in the Affiliate Program.

seg-source.mrk: c. Commissions are held for a period of 2 months from any purchase to protect Company in the event of any chargeback that may occur.
Company shall pay all Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate within fifteen (15) days of the first day of each month after such holdback period (the “Commission Payment Date”).

Company may withhold any Commission payments as well as any actual chargeback fees for which the Company is liable that are generated through transactions from sign ups through the Affiliate Link (“Affiliate Chargeback Fees”), from any Commission Payments to Affiliate.

If at any time Affiliate’s Commission Payments balance is negative as a result of Affiliate Chargeback Fees, Company may suspend or terminate the Affiliate Link or Affiliate’s participation in the Affiliate Program.

target.mrk: c. Las Comisiones son retenidas por un periodo de 2 meses de cualquier compra para proteger a Compañía en el evento de cualquier devolución que pueda ocurrir.

Compañía deberá pagar todas las Comisiones acumuladas y pagables a Afiliado dentro de quince (15) días del primer día de cada mes posterior a dicho periodo de retención (la “Fecha de Pago de Comisión”).

Compañía puede retener cualesquiera pagos de Comisión así como cualquier cuota de devolución por la cual la Compañía es responsable y que son generadas a través de transacciones de registros a través del Enlace de Asociado (”Cuotas de Devolución de Afiliado”), de cualesquiera Pagos de Comisión a Afiliado.

Si en cualquier momento el balance de Pagos de Comisión de Afiliado es negativo como resultado de Cuotas de Devolución de Afiliado, Compañía puede suspender o terminar el Enlace de Afiliado o la participación de Afiliado en el Programa de Afiliado.

trans-unit.source: d. If on any Commission Payment Date, the amount of total Commissions accrued and payable to Affiliate is less than $25.00, then such accrued and payable balance shall be held over to the following month, and paid together with the Commissions due for that month. If at any time, the balance of accrued and payable Commissions is held over for 2 consecutive months, then Company shall pay all accrued and payable Commissions to Affiliate in the third month, regardless of the total amount owed. Payment is made via the Affiliate PayPal account or other account permitted by Company. Affiliate is responsible for any payment processing or PayPal fees associated with delivery and receipt of payment and understands and agrees that payments received will be reduced by any such fees..

Si en cualquier momento, el balance de Comisiones acumuladas y pagables es retenido por más de 2 meses consecutivos, entonces Compañía pagará todas las Comisiones acumuladas y pagables a Afiliado en el tercer mes, sin importar la cantidad total debida.
Pago es hecho a través de la cuenta de PayPal de Afiliado u otra cuenta permitida por Compañía.

Afiliado es responsable de cualesquiera cuotas por proceso de pago o de PayPal asociadas con entrega y recibo y de pago, y comprende y acepta que pagos recibidos serán reducidos por cualesquiera dichas cuotas.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime provides primary care virtual consults with doctors licensed in your state for limited diagnosis, care and prescriptions (as appropriate). HealthTap Concierge lets you connect with your doctor for viritual consults using the HelathTap platform, or with other doctors for second opinions or one-time consults for minor conditions that can be addressed and resolved, in the sole opinion of the doctor, via a virtual consult. HealthTap Premium Services can be a great resource between doctor visits, but are not a substitute for in person doctor visits, your primary care doctor or your primary care doctor’s independent judgment about any symptom, condition, or the appropriateness or risks of a procedure or treatment for a given person. HealthTap Prime is not health insurance and is not a substitute for health insurance.

HealthTap Concierge te deja conectarte con tu doctor para consultas virtuales usado la plataforma de HealthTap, o con otros doctores para segundas opiniones o consultas de una vez para condiciones menores que pueden ser abordadas y resueltas, en la sola opinión del doctor, a través de una consulta virtual.

Los Servicios Premium de HealthTap pueden ser un gran recurso entre visitas al doctor, pero no son un sustituto para visitas al doctor en persona, tu doctor de atención primaria o el juicio independiente de tu doctor de atención primaria acerca de ningún síntoma, condición o lo apropiado o riesgos de un procedimiento o tratamiento para una persona.
HealthTap Prime no es seguro médico y no es un sustituto para seguro médico.

trans-unit.source: On HealthTap you can connect privately with a doctor for an online consultation through our Private Conversation feature. This interaction does not constitute the practice of medicine and consultations cannot be used for providing a medical diagnosis or a physical examination, prescriptions, or treatments. trans-unit.source: The Content and Services may not be used for any illegal purpose. trans-unit.source: Feel Free to share your professional clinical expertise though answers that are evidence-based and consistent with accepted standards in the medical community. Avoid answering questions or providing answers that suggest a duty of care and a doctor-patient relationship.

trans-unit.source: means all confidential and proprietary information, whether received orally, in writing, or by or through a product, that is designated as confidential or that reasonably should be understood to be confidential given the nature of the information and the circumstances of disclosure. trans-unit.source: Participants can pay for Private Conversations, and HealthTap shall collect these Conversation Fees. Subscribers can also provide Participants with a promotional code, which allow for a Private Conversation without a Conversation Fee (when such promotional codes are used, Subscriber shall not receive any compensation for any such interaction). Conversation Fees collected from Participants will be distributed to Subscriber by check or money transfer (using a service such as PayPal) after both (i) the total of the Subscriber’s Conversation Fees exceeds $100 (each a "Payment Distribution") and (ii) Subscriber request, and such distribution to Subscriber shall be the total of all collected Conversation Fees minus the applicable License and Subscription Fees. Conversation Fees and License and Subscription Fees are subject to adjustment pursuant to HealthTap policies and procedures

target.mrk: Los Participantes pueden pagar por Conversaciones Privadas, y HealthTap recolectará estas Cuotas de Conversación.

Los Suscriptores también pueden proporcionar a Participantes con un código promocional, el cual permite una Conversación Privada sin una Cuota de Conversación (cuando dichos códigos promocionales son usados, Suscriptor no recibirá ninguna compensación por cualquiera dicha interacción).

Cuotas de Conversación recolectas de Participantes serán distribuidas a Suscriptor por cheque o transferencia de dinero (usando un servicio como PayPal) después de que ambas (i) el total de las Cuotas de Conversación de Suscriptor excedan $100 (cada una, una “Distribución de Pago”) y (ii) solicitud de Suscriptor, y dicha distribución a Suscriptor deberá ser el total de todas las Cuotas de Conversación menos las Cuotas de Licencia y Suscripción aplicables.
Cuotas de Conversación y Cuotas de Licencia y Suscripción están sujetas a ajuste en conformidad con las políticas y procedimientos de HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: Either party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon thirty (30) days written notice; upon such termination by Subscriber, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap and any such participation shall reinstate this agreement; upon such termination by HealthTap, Subscriber agrees not to participate in any further Private Conversations on HealthTap. This Agreement may be terminated with cause (i) upon thirty (30) days written notice by non-breaching party of a material breach to the breaching party if such breach remains uncured at the expiration of such period; (ii) immediately, if a party becomes the subject of a petition in bankruptcy or any other proceeding relating to insolvency, receivership, liquidation or assignment for the benefit of creditors, (iii) immediately, upon notice by HealthTap upon a breach of any of Sections 3, 4 or 7(D).

YOU AND US CONSENT TO THE PERSONAL JURISDICTION OF THESE COURTS.
Nothing in this agreement limits either party's ability to seek equitable relief.
All notices under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been given upon:

(i) personal delivery; (ii) the second business day after mailing; (iii) the second business day after sending by confirmed facsimile; or (iv) if by HealthTap to Subscriber, the second business day after sending by email.
Notices shall be directed to the party’s current known address, and if by email to HealthTap, to: notice@healthtap.com.

target.mrk: Cada parte declara y garantiza que tiene el poder legal para entrar en este Acuerdo.
Este Acuerdo no crea asociación, empresa conjunta, agencia, fideicomiso o relación de empleo entre las partes.
Este Acuerdo es el acuerdo entero entre Suscriptor y HealthTap en relación al tema, y reemplaza cualesquiera previos Acuerdos en relación con el tema.
Si hay cualquier conflicto entre este acuerdo y un acuerdo escrito mutuamente firmado entre HealthTap y Suscriptor en relación a HealthTap, el acuerdo escrito firmado controlará.
Si HealthTap brinda una traducción de la versión en inglés de este acuerdo, la versión en inglés de este acuerdo controlará si hay un conflicto.
Si HealthTap elige no hacer cumplir cualquier disposición de este Acuerdo, HealthTap se guarda el derecho de hacerla cumplir en el futuro.
Esto significa que una falta de hacer cumplir cualquier disposición de este Acuerdo no constituye una exención de esta disposición.

Si se encuentra que cualquier disposición de este Acuerdo es inaplicable, esa y cualesquiera disposiciones relacionadas serán interpretadas para mejor cumplir con el propósito esencial de la disposición inválida.

Ninguna parte puede asignar ninguno de sus derechos u obligaciones a continuación sin el previo consentimiento escrito de la otra parte (que no debe ser retenido sin razón); provisto, sin embargo, HealthTap puede asignar este Acuerdo sin el consentimiento de Suscriptor, en conexión con una fusión, adquisición, reorganización corporativa o venta de todas o sustancialmente todos de sus activos.
Cualquier intento por una parte de asignar sus derechos u obligaciones bajo este Acuerdo en incumplimiento de esta sección será inválido.
Sujeto a lo anterior, este Acuerdo deberá vincular y ser en beneficio de los sucesores y asignaciones permitidas
Este acuerdo está regido por la ley de California, excluyendo las reglas de derecho aplicable.
LA SEDE EXCLUSIVA PARA CUALQUIER DISPUTA RELACIONADA CON ESTE ACUERDO ES SANTA CLARA COUNTY, CALIFORNIA.

Todas las notificaciones bajo este Acuerdo deben de estar por escrito y serán consideras dadas tras:

(i) entrega personal; (ii) el segundo día hábil después de enviar por correo; (iii) el segundo día hábil después de enviar por facsímil confirmado; o (iv) si por HealthTap a Suscriptor, el segundo día hábil después de enviar por correo electrónico.

trans-unit.source: Every user has a Public Profile. Your Public Profile is how other users will see you on the Site. Your Public Profile is your Public Profile Name, and an image or avatar you choose (your Public Profile Picture). It does not contain any Personally Identifiable Information, unless you put such information in your Public Profile Name or Public Profile Picture. Do not use your real name, picture or any other Personally Identifiable Information in your Public Profile Name and avatar. Each user’s Public Profile is linked to that user’s Health Activity, so that all users on the Site can find similar Public Profiles, and so that we can all share in communal health learning.

No contiene ninguna Información Personalmente Identificable, a menos de que pongas dicha información en tu Nombre de Perfil Público o Foto de Perfil Público.
No uses tu nombre real, foto u cualquier otra Información Personalmente Identificable en tu Nombre de Perfil Público y avatar.

El Perfil Público de cada usuario está ligado a la Actividad de Salud de ese usuario, para que todos los usuarios en el Sitio puedan encontrar Perfiles Públicos similares, y para que nosotros podamos ser parte del aprendizaje comunal de salud.

trans-unit.source: Aggregated information is information from multiple users that is not associated with any individual user account, statistics are summaries of information, not associated with any individual user account, and de-identified data does not include Personally Identifiable Information, such as first and last names or e-mail addresses. Aggregated information and de-identified data and statistics are used to run our service. We may use aggregated information or de-identified data gathered from HealthTap and related statistics to improve the services provided through HealthTap, and for research and analysis. We may also provide this information to our partners for such purposes.

trans-unit.source: We are committed to protecting the privacy of children. This Site is not intended or designed for children under the age of 13. We do not collect Personally Identifiable Information from any person we actually know is a child under the age of 13. A Caregiver may use this site for a Care Recipient who is under the age of 13, but the Care Recipient may not enter any Personally Identifiable Information into the site – all such information must be entered by the Caregiver.
