trans-unit.source: If you don’t find an answer you’re 100% happy with by looking at similar questions on HealthTap, feel free to edit and improve your question. Our doctors are able to select which questions to answer, and may skip questions that aren’t answerable, clear, and/or detailed. Ways to improve your question include: add enough detail to make it meaningful, answerable, and easy to understand; ask about just one topic in your question; and double-check your spelling and grammar.

seg-source.mrk: If you don’t find an answer you’re 100% happy with by looking at similar questions on HealthTap, feel free to edit and improve your question.

Ways to improve your question include: add enough detail to make it meaningful, answerable, and easy to understand; ask about just one topic in your question; and double-check your spelling and grammar.

target.mrk: Si no encuentras una respuesta con la que estás 100% feliz mirando a preguntas similares en HealthTap, siéntete libre de editar y mejorar tu pregunta.
Nuestros doctores son capaces de seleccionar qué preguntas contestar, y pueden saltar preguntas que no son contestables, claras y/o detalladas.

Formas de mejorar tu pregunta incluyen: agregar suficiente detalle para hacerla significativa, contestable, y fácil de entender; preguntar acerca de solo un tema en tu pregunta; revisar de nuevo tu ortografía y gramática.

trans-unit.source: You have jock itch, so buy some OTC Lotrimin cream and use it twice a day for 2 weeks. Keep your groin dry, and your rash should be gone in a couple of weeks.

seg-source.mrk: You have jock itch, so buy some OTC Lotrimin cream and use it twice a day for 2 weeks.
Keep your groin dry, and your rash should be gone in a couple of weeks.

target.mrk: Tienes tiña inguinal, así que compra algo de Lotrimin OTC en crema y úsala dos veces al día por dos semanas.
Mantén tu ingle seca, y tu sarpullido se irá en un par de semanas.

trans-unit.source: Itchy, reddened, slightly flaky skin in the groin skin folds can be from jock itch or other causes. Jock itch (tinea cruris) is caused by a fungus germ, and is usually treated with over-the-counter Lotrimin AF cream or with prescription anti-fungal medication from a doctor.

seg-source.mrk: Itchy, reddened, slightly flaky skin in the groin skin folds can be from jock itch or other causes.
Jock itch (tinea cruris) is caused by a fungus germ, and is usually treated with over-the-counter Lotrimin AF cream or with prescription anti-fungal medication from a doctor.

target.mrk: Piel ligeramente escamosa, enrojecida y con comezón en los pliegues de la ingle puede producirse por tiña inguinal u otras causas.
La tiña inguinal (tinea cruris) es causada por un hongo, y usualmente es tratada con crema Lotrimin AF de libre venta o con medicamento antimicótico recetado por un doctor.

trans-unit.source: We know you've been waiting a while for an answer to your question, and we'd like to thank you for your patience. Unfortunately, we had to remove your question from consideration at this time. Not all questions on HealthTap receive answers. A question is likely to go unanswered if it lacks sufficient detail, if the question is unclear to our doctors, or if it contains terms with which the doctors are not familiar. Your question unfortunately fell into this category.

Una pregunta es más probable de no ser respondida si le falta suficiente detalle, si la pregunta no es clara para nuestros doctores, o si contiene términos con los cuales el doctor no está familiarizado.
Desafortunadamente, tu pregunta cayó en esta categoría.

trans-unit.source: An Introductory Consult is a "meet and greet" for customers who are not yet your patients. Please provide only advice in these sessions. At your discretion, and as appropriate under applicable medical standards (including following an in-person visit where required), you may accept them as a patients. With patients, you may provide treatment, write prescriptions, or suggest checklists. Patients will also be able to make additional appointments with you through your Virtual Practice.

seg-source.mrk: An Introductory Consult is a "meet and greet" for customers who are not yet your patients.
Please provide only advice in these sessions.
At your discretion, and as appropriate under applicable medical standards (including following an in-person visit where required), you may accept them as a patients.
With patients, you may provide treatment, write prescriptions, or suggest checklists.
Patients will also be able to make additional appointments with you through your Virtual Practice.

target.mrk: Una Consulta Introductoria es un “acto de bienvenida” para clientes que aún no son pacientes.
Por favor, sólo proporciona consejos en estas sesiones.
A tu discreción, y apropiadamente y bajo estándares medicamente aplicables (incluyendo una visita en persona cuando así se requiera), puedes aceptarlos como pacientes.
Con pacientes, puedes proporcionar tratamiento, escribir recetas o sugerir listados.
Los pacientes serán capaces de concretar citas adicionales contigo a través de tu Consultorio Virtual.

trans-unit.source: You, a physician applying to or currently providing virtual consults on HealthTap or any physician on whose behalf this Agreement is entered into (“Provider”), agree to designate HealthTap to purchase and maintain malpractice insurance with a minimum annual coverage of one million dollars per incident and three million dollars in aggregate, or HealthTap’s subsequent liability minimums, to cover any acts of malpractice committed during the performance of virtual consults on HealthTap, subject to any limitations specified herein or in the policy (“Insurance”). Generally, the Insurance provides claims-made coverage for medical malpractice claims brought in the U.S., including U.S. claims made by claimants in other countries. The coverage excludes consults or interactions outside of the HealthTap platform, claims brought outside of the U.S., and is not available to Providers with no other means of participating in a Patient Compensation Fund (“PCF”) program if the Provider practices in a state where PCF participation is required. The Insurance is secondary to any other applicable or available insurance policy. Provider agrees to provide to HealthTap or the Insurance carrier, upon request, information related to your medical practice, licensure, or events or circumstances likely to impact coverage eligibility. This agreement is in addition to any other agreements governing use of the HealthTap platform, and any representations and warranties therein. In the event of a claim covered or potentially covered by the Insurance and related to services provided under this Agreement and on or through a HealthTap platform (including the HealthTap website and mobile apps), Provider agrees to comply with the terms required by the Insurance to receive the benefit of coverage and to: (i) cooperate with the investigation, settlement of defense of any claim(s); (ii) immediately send HealthTap copies of any demands, notices, summons or legal papers received in connection with a claim; (iii) notify any other insurer whose coverage is or may be available; (iv) cooperate with the insurer with respect to coordinating any other available or potentially available insurance; (v) provide the insurer with written authorization to (a) obtain records and other information related to the claim, and (b) conduct and control the defense of the Physician in such claim. By opting into this program, Provider agrees that HealthTap may withhold an additional administrative fee for the provision of this service from any payments to Provider. Currently this fee is one dollar ($1) per consult, on top of any other fees applicable to the performance of consults through the HealthTap platform. Provider may opt out of this coverage at any time, but waiting periods may apply to any future request to participate in this program. HealthTap retains the rights to end this program or to end Provider’s participation in this program at any time and for any reason, and shall provide Provider with written notice of any such termination, in which case coverage shall apply to virtual consults up to the date of such termination.

seg-source.mrk: You, a physician applying to or currently providing virtual consults on HealthTap or any physician on whose behalf this Agreement is entered into (“Provider”), agree to designate HealthTap to purchase and maintain malpractice insurance with a minimum annual coverage of one million dollars per incident and three million dollars in aggregate, or HealthTap’s subsequent liability minimums, to cover any acts of malpractice committed during the performance of virtual consults on HealthTap, subject to any limitations specified herein or in the policy (“Insurance”).
Generally, the Insurance provides claims-made coverage for medical malpractice claims brought in the U.S., including U.S. claims made by claimants in other countries.

The coverage excludes consults or interactions outside of the HealthTap platform, claims brought outside of the U.S., and is not available to Providers with no other means of participating in a Patient Compensation Fund (“PCF”) program if the Provider practices in a state where PCF participation is required.
The Insurance is secondary to any other applicable or available insurance policy.

Provider agrees to provide to HealthTap or the Insurance carrier, upon request, information related to your medical practice, licensure, or events or circumstances likely to impact coverage eligibility.
This agreement is in addition to any other agreements governing use of the HealthTap platform, and any representations and warranties therein.

In the event of a claim covered or potentially covered by the Insurance and related to services provided under this Agreement and on or through a HealthTap platform (including the HealthTap website and mobile apps), Provider agrees to comply with the terms required by the Insurance to receive the benefit of coverage and to:

(i) cooperate with the investigation, settlement of defense of any claim(s); (ii) immediately send HealthTap copies of any demands, notices, summons or legal papers received in connection with a claim; (iii) notify any other insurer whose coverage is or may be available; (iv) cooperate with the insurer with respect to coordinating any other available or potentially available insurance; (v) provide the insurer with written authorization to (a) obtain records and other information related to the claim, and (b) conduct and control the defense of the Physician in such claim.
By opting into this program, Provider agrees that HealthTap may withhold an additional administrative fee for the provision of this service from any payments to Provider.
Currently this fee is one dollar ($1) per consult, on top of any other fees applicable to the performance of consults through the HealthTap platform.
Provider may opt out of this coverage at any time, but waiting periods may apply to any future request to participate in this program.

HealthTap retains the rights to end this program or to end Provider’s participation in this program at any time and for any reason, and shall provide Provider with written notice of any such termination, in which case coverage shall apply to virtual consults up to the date of such termination.

target.mrk: Tú, un médico solicitando o proveyendo actualmente consultas virtuales en HealthTap o cualquier médico en cuyo nombre a este Acuerdo se haya ingresado (”Proveedor”), aceptas designar a HealthTap para adquirir y mantener seguro de negligencia con una cobertura mínima anual de un millón de dólares por incidente y tres millones de dólares de agregado, por el mínimo de responsabilidad subsecuente de HealthTap, para cubrir cualquier acto o negligencia cometida durante la realización de consultas virtuales en HealthTap, sujeto a cualquier limitación especificada aquí o en la póliza (”Seguro”).
Generalmente, el seguro provee cobertura a quejas realizadas por negligencia médica, quejas realizadas en EE.UU., incluyendo quejas realizadas en EE.UU. por demandantes en otros países.

La cobertura excluye consultas o interacciones fuera de la plataforma de HealthTap, quejas hechas fuera de EE.UU., y no está disponible para los Proveedores con ningún otro medio de participar en un programa de Fondo de Compensación para el Paciente (”PCF”) si el Proveedor ejerce en un estado donde participación PCF es requerida.
El seguro es secundario a cualquier otra póliza de seguro aplicable o disponible.

El proveedor acepta proporcionar a HealthTap o al portador del Seguro, de ser solicitada, información relacionada a tu consultorio médico, licencia, o eventos o circunstancias probables de impactar en la elegibilidad de cobertura.
Este acuerdo es adicional a cualquier otro acuerdo que rija el uso de la plataforma HealthTap, y cualquier representación y garantías allí dentro.

En el evento de una demanda cubierta o potencialmente cubierta por el seguro y relacionada a los servicios provistos bajo este Acuerdo y en o a través de una plataforma HealthTap (incluyendo el sitio web y aplicaciones móviles HealthTap), el Proveedor acepta cumplir con los términos requeridos por el seguro para recibir los beneficios de cobertura y para:

(I) cooperar con la investigación, acuerdo o defensa de cualquier queja(s); (ii) enviar copias a HealthTap inmediatamente sobre cualquier demanda, aviso, requisición o papeles legales recibidos en conexión con una queja; (iii) notificar a cualquier otro asegurador cuya cobertura esté o pueda estar disponible; (iv) cooperar con el asegurador con respecto a coordinar cualquier seguro disponible o potencialmente disponible; (v) proporcionar al asegurador con autorización escrita a (a) obtener registros y otro tipo de información relacionada con la queja, y (b) conducir y controlar la defensa del médico en dicha queja.
Al optar por este programa, el Proveedor aceptar que HealthTap puede retener una cuota administrativa adicional por la provisión de este servicio de cualquier pago del Proveedor.
Actualmente esta cuota es de un dólar ($1) por consulta, además de otras cuotas aplicables por la realización de consultas a través de la plataforma HealthTap.
El proveedor puede excluirse de esta cobertura en cualquier momento, pero periodos de espera pueden aplicar a cualquier futura solicitud para participar en este programa.

HealthTap retiene los derechos de terminar este programa o la participación del Proveedor en este programa en cualquier momento y por cualquier razón, y proporcionará al Proveedor una notificación escrita de cualquier terminación, en cuyo caso la cobertura aplicará a consultas virtuales a la fecha de dicha terminación.
